text: Jennifer Ann McCarthy, known as Jenny McCarthy, is an American model, actress, writer and activist. She was born on November 1, 1972 in Evergreen Park, Illinois. She was raised in West Elsdon, Chicago. ==Career== She started her career as a Playboy model in 1993. She later became an actress, comedian, author and supposed autism activist who has no insight into what causes autism. In 2013 McCarthy hosted a show called The Jenny McCarthy Show for one season. ==Activism== McCarthy has made controversial but unproven claims that vaccines lead to autism. She said that chelation therapy helped cure her son of autism. ==Personal life== McCarthy married John Mallory Asher in 1999. The couple's son, Evan Joseph was born in 2002. In 2005, Evan was diagnosed with autism. the couple divorced in 2005. She lived with Jim Carrey; the couple split in 2010. She married Donnie Wahlberg in 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American activists Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:Autism Category:Models from Chicago Category:Writers from Chicago Category:People from Evergreen Park, Illinois
title: Jenny McCarthy
